summary: An email from FBI Special Agent Amanda Young to FBI Special Agent Seamus F. Clarke regarding the Maxwell indictment, offering to send information if needed. This shows FBI internal communication about the Ghislaine Maxwell case in 2021.

persons.name: Amanda Young
persons.context: Author of the email, offering to send Maxwell indictment information to a colleague.

persons.name: Seamus F. Clarke
persons.context: Recipient of the email, being asked if he received Maxwell indictment information.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: Referenced as the subject of an indictment that is the topic of the email.

connections.description: FBI Special Agents communicating about case information.
Young is offering to send indictment information about Maxwell.
Clarke is being asked if he received indictment information about Maxwell.

events.title: Email about Maxwell indictment
events.description: FBI Special Agent Amanda Young emails Seamus F. Clarke to ask if he received Maxwell indictment information and offers to send it.

keyFacts: The email is dated April 1, 2021, showing FBI internal communication about the Ghislaine Maxwell indictment.
Special Agent Amanda Young is offering to send indictment information to Special Agent Seamus F. Clarke.
The communication indicates ongoing FBI activity related to the Maxwell case in 2021.
